lines.text: So, those tattoos from the book...
Maybe, uh... maybe he's got them?
Might be hard to tell what with all his skin burned to a crisp, but he's never been reported to use magic.
Reports from when he knocked over a convenience store yesterday didn't mention any tattoos, either.
What would that have to do with his <c=#FF00FF>cause of death,</c> anyway?
